20 class FifoAttr {
21  friend class Fifo;
22 public:
23  FifoAttr(){ memset(&attr_, 0, sizeof(attr_)); }
24  uint32_t used() const { return attr_.used; }
25  uint32_t size() const { return attr_.size; }
26  bool overflow() const { return attr_.overflow != 0; }
27 private:
28  fifo_attr_t attr_;
29 };
